【Your Personal Smart Assistant】Activity tracker (pedometer, calories, distance), heart rate, various sport modes, sleep monitoring.,etc. Get notifications of Call, SMS, and APP messages(THE WATCH CAN NOT MAKE MESSAGES, CALLS or TEXT BACK, Bluetooth distance 8-10 meters), remote control of music and cameras, weather report, sedentary reminder, alarm clock, stopwatch, find phone, call rejection, brightness adjustment, power-saving mode, and other functions to meet your daily needs.
【Long Battery & IP68 Waterproof】The smartwatch only takes 2 hours to charge and can be used for 7-10 days or 30 days standby time, much longer than most traditional watches. The fitness watch is IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when washing hands, in the rain(Note: Do Not use in water more than 100. 40℉, such as showers, saunas, spring, etc).
【Safe Guard Your Health】Advanced HR sensor for accurate and effective heart rate monitoring, helping you better understand your health and making a reasonable adjustment to your lifestyle. Automatic sleep tracking can monitor your sleep status (deep sleep, shallow sleep, awakening) and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help become healthier. You can view the summary of your status in the fitcloudpro APP.
【Overtake Your Expectations】The AGPTEK smart watch is compatible with most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher smart phones version to notify you of call, text, email, calendar, and app notifications. The package includes:AGPTEK Smart Watch*1,TPU Silicone Strap*1, Magnetic Charger*1,User Manual*1. If your have any problem, please feel free to contact our customer service via your amazon account.

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:22:37 UTC – Details)



ROSE QUARTZ GEMSTONE TREE – Rose Quartz is the stone of universal love. The crystal tree symbolizes stability, growth. It will help you to attract wealth, prosperity, success and all good things. Put it in your home or office to improve career luck as well as an excellent Feng Shui Figurine.
FENG SHUI CHAKRA TREE – Feng Shui Quartz Tree of Life Money Tree are made of natural stones, resin and copper wire. Size: Height 6.5-7 Inch. Width 6-6.3 Inch. Energy stone for Creativity, Desire, Pleasure and Relationships. Great ornament for Home decoration, office table decor, shelf decoration.
HEALING CRYSTAL – Crystal Tree for Positive Energy, Healing, Balancing, Spiritual. Each spiritual colored energy healing crystal is strongly connected with a specific Chakra to raise your vibration and to emit positive flow of energy. Also good to balance, cleanse user’s Chakra and to facilitate wise decision making.
Gift Box Wrap – Chakra Tree wrapped with unique design gift box. A wonderful gift for Femal birthday/Christmas/Mother’s Day. Creat your own arts by arrange the copper wire and crystal stone shape. Money tree may have slight deviations in size, color, shape and looks due to handmade and natural stones.
IDEAL GIFT CHOICE – Healing crystal tree is an ideal gift choice during Christmas Day, Anniversary Day, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day and Birthday to your loved one. Also makes a great Housewarming, New Year Gift for Conversation starter for party,entertaining or wedding registry. It make very special personal gifts, which arrive to someone full of positive energy and bring Wealth and Good Luck.

Product Description

APOLOGY:

THE COLOUR WE CALL “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY NOT THE CORRECT COLOUR WHICH WE MADE A MISTAKE WHILE BUILDING THE LISTS. AND AS THE COLOUR BLANK COULD NEVER BE ALTERED SINCE BEEN SUBMITED. SO WE MAKE THE APOLOGY HERE AND THE “WHITE” IN “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY “CREAM”.WE ARE REALLY SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE WE HAVE MADE AND PROMISE WE WOULD BE MORE CAUTIOUS IN THE JOB COMING UP.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

Effective Protection: Use High-quality leatherette as the surface of Cushions, waterproof, wear-resistant and easy to clean, can be cleaned by wet towel. Fashion Looking: Upgrade your vehicle instantly with this fashion looking and Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.Easy to Install: We provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:31 UTC – Details)

Product Description

All-day Heart Rate Monitoring

The advanced built-in heart rate sensor will continuously measure your heart rate all day (every 5 mins). You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on your watch or intuitively check the heart rate graph in the app.

Fitness Tracker with Multiple Sports Modes

Accurately record all-day activities like steps, calories burned, miles walked, exercise duration. This watch has 9 exercise modes, including running, walking, bicycle, dynamic cycling, hike, climbing, treadmill, Yoga.

You can also activate GPS function of your smart phone and track the routes you have traveled during workout via the app.

Receive Notifications on the Watch

With the watch connected to the app, it will vibrate to notify you when your phone receives incoming calls, text, SNS messages from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc. You can view the messages or decline the calls on the watch directly. Keep you informed in time of anything important. (Please note: not support answer calls or reply message.)

Music Control and Practical Tools

Once the smartwatch is connected to your phone, you can use the watch to control your smart phone’s music (Skip, Play/Pause music).

This sports watch also supports 10 alarm clocks, sedentary reminder, stop watch, timer, breath training, menstrual cycle tracking and other practical tools.

Outstanding Battery Life & Adjustable Brightness Levels

When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 7 days extra-long battery life or 30 days standby time. This watch has 3 different levels of brightness, so you can choose a suitable level for different surroundings, such as in the sun or at night.

IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch

This smartwatch meets IP68 waterproof standard, which can withstand all your daily activities. You can wear it when wash your hands, run in the rain, or take part in intensive workouts. (Please note: It can’t track your swimming data)

Compatibility
iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices No need App iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices

【Accurate Fitness Tracker with 9 Sport Modes】 This fitness tracker watch can accurately provide 24hrs heart rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring and female cycle tracking. 9 sports modes are optional, including various outdoor and indoor activities, allow you to get the real-time stats during your workouts on the watch. You can also connect it to smartphone’s GPS to track all your workout routes and distance traveled during exercise.
【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone Android Phones】- This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones(Not for PC or tablet). Pair the smart watch to your phone and receive all incoming calls, messages, apps notifications straight to your smartwatch including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more. (Please note: only supports receiving calls and messages).
【24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】 This smart tracker watch will monitor your heart rate every 5 minutes all day; It also detect and track your sleep, and analyze your sleep quality automatically.(deep sleep, light sleep, and awake time). By connecting the smartwatch to your phone, the app will provide detailed heart rate chart and comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you stay active and stay healthy:)
【Long-lasting battery & IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch】 When fully-charged, this watch can last for up to 7 days or 30 days standby time. With IP68 waterproof, this fitness watch can meet the waterproof requirements of your daily activities such as washing hands or working out in the rain with it. Whether it’s sweat or a small splash, just handle it with ease.
【Smart Watch for Women Men with More Practical Features】 This watch can fit for 6.2-9.2 inch wrist, suits for both women and men. It has many practical features, such as female menstrual cycle tracker, alarm clocks, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder. It’s a also very good choice as gift for your friends and family members to help them stay motivated all day!

GRV

Combining wearable technology with sports & health!

Previous page

  2. GRV is a company that mainly designs and produces wearable technology. Our products are exported to Europe and US. The main products are smart watches, Fitness Activity trackers and wireless earphones. We use the industry’s top technology and design and more scientific and accurate induction algorithms, to bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer, so that every user can find suitable and trustworthy products in GRV.

  3. Suitable for men and women

    The appearance of the watch is versatile, and it is also very suitable for men with large wrists.

  4. Heart rate monitor

    GRV smart watches use the latest infrared sensors, which can read your heart rate accurately and quickly, and monitor 24 hours a day.

  5. Fashion and beautiful

    GRV’s watch design is very fashionable and beautiful, it is a small accessory for you to match

  6. Activity Tracker

    Accurately record your heart rate, calories and steps to help you understand yourself better

  7. No bluetooth fitness tracker

    This fitness tracker that does not need to be connected to a mobile phone and does not require an app, very easy to use.

  8. True wireless earbuds

    GRV wireless earbuds adopts the latest Bluetooth technology, and the sound quality is clear and stable.

  9. product list

  10. product list

From the brand

New Arrivals

Pink Tool Set

Drills & Pliers

Screwdrivers & tool bags

Longer Lasting Power: the pink drill set is powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications.
Compact and Lightweight Design: the pink drill driver allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site.
Multiple Purposes: the pink power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes.
Notice：This is a carbon brushes drill. It is normal that the brushes produce sparks from the electromagnetic charge which are clearly visible inside the drill.
The pink drill set for women is perfect for your home use or gifts.

12V Cordless Drill Set includes:

(1) 12V Cordless Drill Driver;

(1) 12V 1.5AH Lithium-Ion Battery;

(10) HSS6542 drill bits:1/16, 5/64, 3/32, 7/64, 1/8, 9/64, 5/32, 11/64, 3/16, 1/4;

(20) Screwdriver bits: Slotted 1/8”, 5/32”, 3/16”, 7/32”, 1/4”, 9/32”, POZI: PZ0, PZ1, PZ2, PZ3; Philips: PH0, PH1 X 2, PH2 X 5, PH3 X 2;

(10) Nut drivers: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 1/4, 9/32, 5/16, 11/32, 3/8, 7/16, 15/32;

(1) 60mm magnetic extension bar;

(1) Battery Charger;

(1) Tool bag;

FASTPRO 12V Pink Drill Driver

FASTPRO 12V Lithium-ion Cordless Pink Drill Driver Set powered by a powerful 12-Volt, 1.5 AH Lithium-ion battery for enough power for a full range of applications. The power drill features a 3/8 in. keyless chuck with a 19-position clutch adjusts torque output to control the depth of the screw or fastener. The drill is designed with variable 2-speed settings (0-400 rpm and 0-1500 rpm) for multiple purposes. The compact and lightweight design allows users to carry out drilling/driving tasks in confined spaces and offers users greater comfort and efficiency on the job site. Its built-in LED light to illuminate work surfaces and allows users to quickly change attachments for any project need.

From the brand

Letton focus on R&D and manufacturing wireless keyboard and mouse combo.

Our products have brilliant designs and satisfy the ultimate performance demand from customers and professional eSports teams. In order to manufacture the products with professional-grade quality and durability, we pay a lot of attention to the selection of materials, design of the surface and development of hardware.

WIRELESS KEYBOARD MOUSE COMBO

COLOR WIRELESS KEYBOARD MOUSE

【Pink Wireless Keyboard Mouse Set】 Includes Cute Wireless Pink Keyboard with Round Retro Style Key and Wireless Optical Mice. ALL-IN-ONE PC GAMER VALUE KIT. ATTENTION: The CONNECTOR FOR THE PC IS ON THE BACK OF THE MICE.
【Full-Size keyboard with Cute Round Keys】The computer keyboards with mouse has pink retro round keys and the silent click of the quiet mice will allow you to do your job without disturbing others. The mini Optical mouse is with modern ergonomic design, DPI adjustable(800-1200-1600).
【Detachable Round Keycaps & Floating Button Design】All circle buttons can be disassembled, put in water to clean, and also equipped with a brush to clean the dust on the aethestic keyboard.
【2.4GHz Wireless Dropout-Free Connection】2.4GHz signal delivers up to a range of 28 feet connection that allows you to work with your PC from a distance. One small Nano receiver (USB 2.0) connects both the mouse and keyboard,high speed rate of return allows the combo to ensure their stable and smooth transmission without delay and frame skip, hence to enhance your typing experience.
【Durability Battery Life】Both keyboard and mouse wireless turn into Power-save mode automatically, click any key or button to wake-up within seconds. Each of them runs on one AA battery (Included). Low battery indication shows in the top right corner, when the battery is dying,the keyboard’s low battery indication light will remind you to replace the battery.
【Wide Compatible】The pink wireless keyboard and mouse compatible with operating systems(USB 2.0 port)—Windows or Mac OS, Work perfectly with Mac, Destop, PC, Laptop and more.
【1 Year Warranty】The cute mouse and keyboard set with graceful gift package, you can used it by yourself or as a gift to friends, lovers, children, etc. This full-Sized round keyboards mouse comes with one year warranty, if you encounter any problems please contact us through Amazon email, we will provide you with satisfactory solutions.

Letton V2020 Advanced 2.4 GHz Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combos delivers a fast, reliable, secure connection using 128-bit AES keyboard encryption with virtually no delays or dropouts—even in busy wireless environments.

Read more

Letton focus on R&D and manufacturing wireless keyboard and mouse combo.

Our products have brilliant designs and satisfy the ultimate performance demand from customers and professional eSports teams. In order to manufacture the products with professional-grade quality and durability, we pay a lot of attention to the selection of materials, design of the surface and development of hardware.

Full-size Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo with Numeric Keypad

Plug & Play, One Nano Receiver Connect Both Keyboard and Mouse

This series of wireless keyboard mouse combo is made of plastic characterized by ergonomic design and comfortable feel. The round buttons design combine the inspiration of vintage typewriters with research and development by the size of the contact area between fingers and keycaps, which provide a more comfortable typing experience.

Keyboard weight: 718+5g

Mouse weight: 75+5g

Keyboard size: 17.7*5.47*1.37 in

Mouse size: 4*2.44*1.2 in

  • Package Contents:
  • 1x Full-size Wireless keyboard
  • 1xWireless mouse
  • 1xNano receiver(On the back of the keyboard)
  • 1xUser manual
  • 2xAA Batteries

Read more

Plug & Play Wireless Receiver

No drive needed, Simply plug the included wireless receiver into your computer’s USB port, it install automatically. Both wireless keyboard and mouse will be connected in the same time,and start using your keyboard and mouse without software to install.

MOUSE with Adjustable DPI

The mouse offers 3 adjustable DPI levels(800-1200-1600) for you to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to meet your different requirements.

Wide Compatible

The wirelss combo support operatingsystems with USB2.0 port,such as Windows 2000，XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10，Mac OS, Smart TV and more. (Note: Hotkeys function may not fully compatible with Mac, OS System)

Read more

Feel-good Typing

This wireless combo cradles your hands in comfort to help minimize hand and wrist strain,even after spending all day at your computer.

Keyboard Shortcuts

Save time with eight keyboard hot keys. Full-size keyboard provide instant access to most-used applications like email, Internet and volume up/down.

FN+ESC : Music Player FN+F1 : Player/ Pause FN+F2 : Previous One FN+F3 : Next One FN+F4 : Volume+ FN+F5 : Volume- FN+F6 : Mute FN+F7 : Web FN+F8 : Search FN+F9 : Favorites FN+F10 : Email FN+F11 : Lock FN+F12 : Windows

Install Instructions

  1. Open the battery case, insert the battery to the case of keyboard and mice, One AA battery for the mouse, One AA battery for the keyboard( battery included).
  2. Cover the battery case and remove the receiver.
  3. Insert the receiver into the computer USB interface, wait a minute and you can use this combo immediately.

Read more

4.5
Price: $42.99 - $38.89
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:06:15 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $729.99 - $499.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:20:02 UTC – Details)


Everything you need is right in your screen. Watch, work and chat – all without connecting a separate PC – with the Smart Monitor. Your favorite content, productivity and video call apps are built-in for a simpler and more stylish desk setup that’s a joy to use every time. *App availability may vary by country and separate subscriptions may be required. Requires internet connection and TV tuner is not included. Samsung TV Plus and Universal Guide may not be available in some regions. Remote control specifications may vary by country. Product color availability may vary by country. **Product color availability may vary by country. ***Apple TV+ may not be available in all regions.****On-screen content simulated for demonstration purpose. Microsoft 365 requires Microsoft account. Wireless DeX supported on selected Galaxy, Note, and Tab devices. Windows 10 Pro, Mac OS 10.5, or higher, and compatible network settings are required for this feature. Product color availability may vary by country. *****Available technology, functions and features may vary by country, service provider, network environment or product, and are subject to change without notice. Requires a Wi-Fi, Bluetooth or other wireless network connection and devices registered to SmartThings app. Connected devices are sold separately. For full compatible device list, please check https://www.smartthings.com/products. A separate SmartThings Dongle is required to connect to Zigbee devices. (Connection to Z-Wave device is not supported.) ******Amazon, Alexa and all related marks are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. Bixby voice commands recognize English (US/UK/IN), French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese(BR), Chinese (in China mainland only) and Korean.
SMART TV EXPERIENCE: Enjoy Netflix, YouTube and other streaming services by simply connecting the monitor to WiFi; Samsung TV Plus also offers free, live, on-demand content with no downloads or sign-up needed, while Universal Guide provides personalized content recommendations*.
FLAVORFUL COLOR OPTIONS: Smart Monitor provides a pop of your favorite color to instantly lighten any room design; Choose from white, pink, blue or green and make your space authentically you**
ICONIC SLIM DESIGN: The Smart Monitor is built with your lifestyle in mind, delivering a more cutting-edge design; With an ultra-slim flat back, neat camera design and beautiful colors, the monitor offers a minimalist look that enhances your setup with super style***
PC-LESS PRODUCTIVITY: Browse the web, edit documents and work on projects, all without the need for a separate PC; With new Workmode, you can also remotely access another PC, use Microsoft 365 programs and connect to Samsung mobile devices with Samsung DeX for seamless working****
SLIMFIT CAMERA: The SlimFit camera with tilt functionality allows you to create the perfect angle while using your favorite video call apps like Google Duo, which can be accessed directly through the monitor; Camera cover and option to fully detach always protect your privacy

4
Price: $729.99 - $499.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 02:20:02 UTC – Details)
